MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-NOV-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety in the WA10  postcode area of St Helens following a request by Cadent Utility in their investigations on the gas network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.44pm on 18th of Nov 2020.
